title: use the same settings on a new computer
author: theoneandonly-vector
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
I would like to use the same settings I have on one computer on another computer

## Expected Behavior // ## Current Behavior
<!--- If you're describing a bug, tell us what should happen -->
copying C:\Users\%username%\AppData\Roaming\mRemoteNG -> new PC same place
&
copying C:\Users\%username%\AppData\Local\mRemoteNG -> new PC same place

and then opening mRemoteNG should result in the same config on the new PC I thoug...

comments.snippet:
this is related to planed changes https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/issues/2134
then you can save user preferences and after transfer or deploy just drop it into same folder with mRemoteNG and it will fetch user names and path to deploy/use it
comments.author: Kvarkas

comments.snippet:
@Kvarkas yes the user interface settings would make more sense when saved in the Appdata Roaming (as in the mentioned issue), though this does not explain why when copying all files the configuration is not used. 

@theoneandonly-vector The Appdata\Local\mRemoteNG folder includes another folder with random string (don't know where it's taken from or generated). I guess you might want to open mRemoteNG on the new machine and change a setting to generate the folder, and then put the _user.config...
